scripts.testes: npm run excluir-results && npx playwright test
scripts.testes-report: npm run excluir-results && npx playwright test && npm run report
scripts.report: npm run copiar-history-raiz && npm run copiar-results && npm run excluir-report && npx allure generate ./allure-results -o ./allure-report && npx allure open ./allure-report
